igraphlite 0.10.15.1

Check if an object is igraph_ptr class

Source: R/igraphlite-package.R
is_igraph.Rd

Check if an object is igraph_ptr class

Usage

is_igraph(x)

Arguments

x

An object to be tested.

Value

TRUE if the object is of class igraph_ptr, FALSE otherwise.

See also

as_igraph() to convert an object to igraph_ptr.

Examples

is_igraph(graph_tree(6L))
#> [1] TRUE
is_igraph(seq_len(6L))
#> [1] FALSE
